tag_list: online-marketing, seo, sem, ppc, social-media, online-media-consulting
overview:
Jonathan Sackheim is an online marketing professional who specializes in Search Engine Marketing, SEO, and Social Media. Jonathan resides in Boulder, CO and also works in Denver, CO. Jonathan’s hobbies include mountain biking, skiing, rock climbing, and running.

Jonathan currently runs the Boulder Facebook Page, which is the largest Boulder related Facebook page, with over 48,000 fans. http://www.facebook.com/boulder.colorado

Jonathan has been a social media speaker for SEMPO, the Boulder Chamber of Commerce, and the Boulder Women’s Business Leads Group. He has consulted for a number of Fortune 500 companies including Xcel Energy, Avaya, and Dish Network.

More information can be found on LinkedIn at: http://www.linkedin.com/in/sackheim
